page.title: 20 PRESENT AND FUTURE CONTD.
page.content: Our village has to change. People find it difficult to agree how, some even that it should change at all. Most people feel however that there should be more opportunities for young people to find employment locally and to buy reasonably priced houses here when they grow up. Here are some more comments that were made to us by local residents. "The village is getting spoilt with these new, expensive properties. I would like old, farm buildings developed which are left derelict." "Some limited development, perhaps some self-help/government assisted scheme could provide lower cost housing for local young people who want to settle in the village." "I would like the old village of Kirk Ireton to stay as it is, unspoiled. I have been in it all my life."
